attributes.action: Means test 10 house £60,000,000 ex-PM Tony Blair's State Security Benefits.
attributes.additional_details:
£60,000,000 Blair receives extra security benefits worth £14,000 to £16,000 by visiting up to five countries a week.
http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/uknews/1488139/Blair-refuses-to-rule-out-means-testing-of-pensions.html
http://www.theguardian.com/politics/2015/jun/12/tony-blair-police-protection-costs-taxpayers-millions-report-claims
http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/politics/tony-blair/11670425/Revealed-Tony-Blair-worth-a-staggering-60m.html
http://www.theguardian.com/world/2004/sep/16/iraq.iraq
attributes.background:
He receives free personal and property security benefits, including a chauffeur driven car worth £millions a year.
Tony Blair has made a lot of money. He took this country into an expensive and illegal war, as well as speculating with leveraged property investments.
Means test his state benefits.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what you mean by "means test". If you would like the Government to stop paying for this, you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/109665
